review.title: “I love my J Hilburn Business! The company is growing and adding new partners nationwide!”
review.pros: Pros – Be your own boss. Own your own franchise without the startup costs. Great comp. plan and bonus/incentive plan. Amazing products. Fun!
review.cons: Cons – There are no cons, but you must be a self-starter and want your own business and to work for a rapidly growing and changing company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep adding more great merchandise for your customers!
